definition: the humane quality of understanding the suffering of others and wanting to do something about it, share the suffering of
details:
noun
- the humane quality of understanding the suffering of others and wanting to do something about it
= synonyms: compassion
- an unfortunate development
= example: an unfortunate development
= synonyms: shame
- a feeling of sympathy and sorrow for the misfortunes of others
= example: a feeling of sympathy and sorrow for the misfortunes of others
= synonyms: pathos, commiseration, ruth
verb
- share the suffering of
= synonyms: compassionate
